attributes.action: Stop underage gambling by banning video-game related gambling sites
attributes.additional_details:
Some of my losses:
https://gyazo.com/452ed61af8f43fc498b1b3815fcc6326 $5.53 loss
https://gyazo.com/0c126ab073bdffbb4f6534e24e960e22 $38.6 loss
https://gyazo.com/d6192c2ed7d4b9624f545eb7c4c8ce36 $19.14 loss
https://gyazo.com/34b73ac5ea7551a87c329c77db1a9e94 $41.81 loss
https://gyazo.com/fe03cb8b3fb2baa8333cf4491f82e567 $19 loss
https://gyazo.com/b640f0c782efd43089c0aa12bd2fd779 $4.57 loss
Those are not all of my losses as I was unable to show my losses from the now banned sites.
attributes.background: These sites work by depositing in-game items known as 'skins' which are worth real money (between $0.03 and $40000). They encourage underage gambling and should not be allowed to operate in the UK and a few have even been blocked from being accessed in the UK. Full description: http://bit.ly/2k2BEt2

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "video-game related gambling sites".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201300
